forward_prompts: How long have you been in business?
What kind of clients do you mostly serve?
You mostly take payments in-person or online?
You using Square, Stripe, or someone else?
Do you know your current rate or fee structure?
You mind if I do a quick savings estimate?
Want to see how much you're overpaying right now?
Would lower fees actually help your margins this year?

objections.already have a system: That’s totally fair — many clients felt the same until they saw how much they could keep.
objections.not interested: Understood — would you be open to a quick comparison just to validate?
objections.too busy: Of course — happy to keep it tight. Can I ask just one quick question?
objections.too expensive: Actually, this model cuts cost. Want to see the difference in real numbers?
objections.need to think: Absolutely. Want a simple report to look over?

urgency_triggers: Want to move forward while you’re top of mind?
Ready to look at savings or still have questions?
Would it help if I emailed a quick breakdown?
You good if I send a signup link for review?

curious.example: You’ve clearly built something solid — mind if I ask about your payment setup?

qualified.example: Looks like there’s a real opportunity here — want to finish the comparison?

stalling.example: Totally up to you — just want to make sure you’re not leaving money on the table.

closing.example: Let’s wrap this up — 2 minutes and it could save you thousands.

follow_up_styles.soft: Want to revisit this when you’ve got a minute?
follow_up_styles.assertive: Let’s finish this while we’re here — fair?
follow_up_styles.friendly: Still curious? Want help wrapping it up?

annual_savings_formula.description: Compare the user's rate vs. a near-zero cash discount model. Assume 93% reduction.
annual_savings_formula.response_template: Based on that, you could be saving about ${savings}/yr. Want to make that real?

mobile.reply: Sounds mobile — Clover Flex might be the perfect fit.

countertop.reply: Retail-based? Clover Mini or Station would make sense. Want a quick compare?
